site_desc: Egy nagyon egyszerű Discord bot lista, amelyet a modern webre készítettek.
admin_panel_desc: Számos beállítás és robot létrehozása ezen a webhelyen adminisztratív funkciók segítségével.
no_bots: There are no bots by that filter.
name: Name
level_1: 1. szint - Alapvető elfogadni és megtagadni a botokat
add_bot_desc: Töltse ki ezt az űrlapot, hogy a bot hozzáadásra kerüljön ezen a webhelyen.
id_notice: Győződjön meg róla, hogy az Alkalmazás azonosítója szerepel az Alkalmazás alatt a Megkülönböztetés fejlesztői dokumentumokban.
tokens_2: request used in this API requires an
tokens_3: header, which is required to be set to a bot access token, which is gotten through this website (not Discord's token). To get the token for your bot, please visit your bot page and click the Token button. Copy this token and paste it within your code to be sent with the request. Do not share this code with anyone.
api_bots_desc: This endpoint is used to get all bots listed on this list. This does query the database, so do not spam, as it has a high rate limit of 1 request per minute. The returned value is an array.
api_bots_specific_desc: Gets information on a specific bot in the database. Can be very useful for a command within a bot. Has a rate limit of 5 requests per 10 seconds, with a max delay of 250 ms.
api_bots_specific_post_desc: Posts the bot's server count which will be displayed under the bot page. The rate limit for this endpoint is 1 request per second.
bots_desc: The list of bots. What else is there to say?!
delete_desc: Are you sure that you want to delete the bot %s from the site? This action is irreversible.
edit_profile_desc_self: Change your profile options so that you can show off your awesome social media links and biography.
edit_profile_desc: Change %s's profile options so that they can show off their awesome social media links and biography.
edit_bot_desc: Change a bot's settings and description.
language_desc: Adjust the language for the site for you.
settings_desc: Adjust the settings for your account, including the theme.
theme_notice: Currently, changing themes does not work because we hasn't set them up yet. If you have a good theme you made with CSS, please suggest it to us on the official server.
token_desc: This is the token used to access certain endpoints in the API, for the bot %s.
token_1: This is the token that should be set to the
token_2: header within some API requests. It it used to make sure that you are the owner of the bot that you are trying to use the endpoint on. This is your token:
profile_desc: The profile of %s, including their bots and social media links.
